name: WhoisZombie(Ads)
description:
◎ Game Introduction
A shelter built to protect humans from zombies.
You are the supervisor, and your job is to identify the zombies and people.

◎ Game Features
People and zombies look different.
Check their appearance to decide whether they are zombies or not.
Gather information from magazines, news, and conversations to determine who is who.
Beware of zombies with suspicious abilities. Over time, new zombie virus strains will emerge.
Manage the relations between the characters and the government forces wisely.
Your fate may depend on that.

Survive 30 days of unexpected events.
Your choices determine the future of the shelter.
Lead your people to the right path.

Inquiries:
cindyz@cindyzstudio.com
